topics.body:
So I'm just finished with Episode 17 of AoT.
As usual, things have gotten interesting. But this time, it's gotten quite serious, and it's really going to heat things up for the story:

[spoiler]That Female Titan is something. Apparently she's certainly a person with the same ability as Eren, as in she is a person who can turn into a Titan herself.[/spoiler]
[spoiler]And how the hell did Reiner survived getting almost killed? And why was he steaming afterwards?[/spoiler]

~...wait a second...~
~something's not right here...~

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c46e73636872401d2d0200#post_54c46e73636872401d2d0200
During Part 7 the series switched publishers. It's no longer on a weekly schedule and is now on a monthly one. Araki also decided to change up his drawing style to be more realistic in terms of bodies and faces.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
